summary: This bill authorizes the International Boundary and Water Commission to accept funds from federal or non-federal entities for wastewater treatment, water conservation, and flood control projects. It outlines limitations on fund usage, including restrictions on reimbursement and source of funds from foreign entities of concern. The bill mandates the Commission to submit annual reports detailing fund utilization and associated costs. The Commission is defined as the U.S. Section of the International Boundary and Water Commission, United States and Mexico.
